body.paragraph: The default input notatiotion is Dot Bracket Notation, reference guide below

An alternative input file format is Arc Annotated Sequence, similar to the Extended Dot-Bracket Notation format in which the weak bonds are expressed as a list 
 (i_1,j_1);(i_2,j_2); ... ;(i_m,j_m) 
 where each index i_k, j_k belongs to the interval [1,n] (n is the length of the primary sequence) and i_k < j_k + 1 for all k.
